content:
say you have a function as follows:

def func(word):

    for letter in word:

       print(letter)

Would the complexity of this function be denoted as Big Theta(n) or Big Theta (len(word))?
subject: Proper way to denote big theta

content: You always denote the complexity of a function in terms of the input tp the function. In this case, you state it in terms of len(word)!
